This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with ovarian carcinoma, testing the drug fondaparinux, and includes eligibility criteria such as age, disease stage, performance status, and organ function.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with metastatic or unresectable solid tumors, specifically differentiated thyroid cancer and renal cell carcinoma, testing the efficacy of rosiglitazone and xl184 drugs, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with non-Hodgkin lymphoma, testing the drugs sb-485232 and rituximab, with eligibility criteria including confirmed diagnosis, prior treatment with rituximab, and predicted life expectancy of at least 12 weeks.
This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs pazopanib and lapatinib on patients with advanced renal cell carcinoma, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia, testing the effectiveness of fludarabine, obinutuzumab, bendamustine, and cyclophosphamide as treatment options, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with metastatic melanoma, testing the drugs disulfiram and arsenic trioxide, with eligibility criteria including measurable disease, prior systemic therapy, and a performance status of 0-2.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with prostate cancer, testing the drugs sunitinib malate, docetaxel, and prednisone, with eligibility criteria including a histological diagnosis of adenocarcinoma of the prostate, metastatic prostate cancer unresponsive to hormone therapy, and adequate hepatic and renal function.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with solid tumors or lymphoma who are resistant/refractory to approved therapies or for whom no appropriate therapies are available, and the drug being tested is lenvatinib. The eligibility criteria include completion of previous treatment, age greater than or equal to 18 years, Karnofsky performance status greater than or equal to 70%, and written informed consent. Exclusion criteria include brain tumors or metastases, certain laboratory parameters, uncontrolled infections, cardiac impairment, recent treatment with investigational drugs, pregnancy or lactation, and various medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL) who have relapsed after prior treatment, and it will test the effectiveness of rituximab and alemtuzumab as potential drugs for treatment.
This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for Crohn's disease, testing the drug chondroitin sulfate, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs belinostat and 5-fluorouracil (5-fu) on patients with advanced colorectal cancer or other adenocarcinomas, who have shown tumor progression after standard chemotherapy or where none is yet approved, and meet various eligibility criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for non-small cell lung cancer patients, testing the drugs bevacizumab, erlotinib, and pemetrexed, with eligibility criteria including age, disease stage, performance status, renal and hepatic function, bone marrow function, and prior procedures, while excluding certain histologies, hypercalcemia, infections, and other conditions.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia, testing the effectiveness of multiple drugs including busulfan, cyclophosphamide, and fludarabine phosphate, among others, in combination with stem cell transplant. The eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics, availability of a donor, and various patient characteristics such as organ function and absence of certain infections.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with castration-resistant prostate cancer, testing the drug MDV3100, and includes eligibility criteria such as confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate, ongoing androgen deprivation therapy, and exclusion criteria such as brain metastases and history of another malignancy within the previous 5 years.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with relapsed or refractory acute myeloid leukemia (AML), testing the combination of voreloxin injection and cytarabine as a treatment option. The eligibility criteria include specific disease subtypes, prior treatment history, and certain laboratory values.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for the treatment of b-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia and small lymphocytic lymphoma using the drug pci-32765. The eligibility criteria include age requirements, previous treatment history, ECOG performance status, and willingness to participate in evaluations and procedures. Exclusion criteria include prior malignancy, recent therapy, CNS involvement, major surgery, concomitant use of certain medications, significant ECG abnormalities, and lactating or pregnant status.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with metastatic breast neoplasms and metastases, neoplasm. The study aims to evaluate the efficacy of cyclophosphamide, doxorubicin hydrochloride, fludarabine phosphate, paclitaxel, and mesna in treating these diseases, with specific eligibility criteria for patient selection.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for women with Her-2 positive and ER-negative or ER-low breast cancer, testing the effectiveness of trastuzumab (herceptin®) in preventing metastasis, with specific eligibility criteria including no prior treatment with chemotherapy, hormonal therapy, or trastuzumab.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial testing the use of g-csf and saline in patients preparing for in vitro fertilization and embryo transfer with endometrial growth of less than 7 mm, unresponsive to standard treatment, and excluding patients with sickle cell disease, renal insufficiency, upper respiratory infection or pneumonia, chronic neutropenia, and known past or present malignancy.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with breast cancer, testing the drugs lapatinib ditosylate and doxil, with eligibility criteria including confirmed adenocarcinoma of the breast, measurable disease, and specific patient characteristics and prior concurrent therapy requirements.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with unspecified adult solid tumors, testing the combination of pr-104, docetaxel, and gemcitabine hydrochloride, with specific eligibility criteria including confirmed tumor malignancy, certain blood counts, liver and kidney function, and exclusion of certain medical disorders or infections.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial investigating the drugs ji-101 and everolimus for the treatment of refractory solid tumors, metastatic ovarian carcinoma, metastatic KRAS mutant colorectal cancer, and metastatic head and neck squamous cell cancer. The eligibility criteria include having measurable tumors, being in good organ and marrow function, and not having certain medical conditions or allergies.
This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C, testing the drugs bms-791325 and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial that aims to evaluate the efficacy of amifostine trihydrate, busulfan, filgrastim, melphalan, and thiotepa in treating high-risk or relapsed solid tumors or brain tumors, including Ewing's sarcoma, rhabdomyosarcoma, Wilms' tumor, neuroblastoma, retinoblastoma, germ cell tumors, soft tissue sarcomas, ovarian sarcoma, primitive neuroectodermal tumors, chordomas, and hepatoblastoma, in patients aged 1 to 45 with specific eligibility criteria.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients with hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) using the drug Nexavar, and it includes eligibility criteria such as age, diagnosis confirmation, performance status, and various health assessments.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients with asthma, testing the drug iloprost, and the eligibility criteria include age 18-60, controlled asthma, ability to give informed consent, ability to perform pulmonary function tests, ability to tolerate the initial Ventavis inhalation, and ability to comply with the study protocol.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with metastatic prostate cancer who have failed previous treatments, and it aims to evaluate the effectiveness of the drug he3235 in treating the disease. The eligibility criteria include having confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate, disease progression despite hormone therapy, and specific PSA levels or evidence of disease progression.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial testing the combination of temsirolimus and sunitinib in patients with renal cell carcinoma, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for each phase of the trial.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with advanced solid tumors or lymphoma, testing the combination of gemcitabine hydrochloride and triapine as a potential treatment option. The eligibility criteria include specific requirements for performance status, blood counts, liver and kidney function, and exclusion of certain medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for asthma patients, testing the drugs gsk679586 and placebo, with inclusion criteria including age, body weight, non-smoking status, and ability to read and comprehend English, and exclusion criteria including medical unsuitability, allergies, previous exposure to antibody therapy, and history of chronic infections.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for HIV infections, testing the drug maraviroc in combination with other investigational antiretroviral compounds, with specific eligibility criteria based on genotype interpretation and resistance testing.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with glioblastoma or gliosarcoma, testing the drugs enzastaurin and temozolomide, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for a drug called rv568 and a placebo, testing their effectiveness in treating respiratory syncytial virus infections. This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial testing the drug regorafenib (stivarga, bay73-4506) on Chinese subjects with advanced solid tumors that are refractory to standard treatment or have no standard therapy available. The inclusion criteria include being over 18 years old, having an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status of 0-1, and having adequate bone marrow, liver, and renal function. The exclusion criteria include unstable/uncontrolled cardiac disease, history of arterial or venous thrombotic or embolic events, malabsorption condition, severe renal impairment, symptomatic metastatic brain or meningeal tumors, and clinically significant bleeding within 30 days before starting the study medication.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, specifically diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and mantle cell lymphoma, using vincristine sulfate liposome injection plus rituximab as the drug combination, with specific eligibility criteria for patients to be included in the study.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for relapsed CD20-positive B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, testing the efficacy of drugs such as Zevalin, Rituxan, BCNU, VP-16, Ara-C, Melphalan, and G-CSF, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with advanced cancer, solid tumors, and neoplasms, testing the drug rigosertib sodium, with specific eligibility criteria including previous treatment history, performance status, blood counts, liver and kidney function, and contraception requirements.
This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drug bavituximab in adults with HIV and chronic hepatitis C infection, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 1 trial that aims to evaluate the efficacy of temsirolimus and vinorelbine ditartrate in patients with metastatic or unresectable solid tumors, including lung, breast, ovary, cervix, prostate, uterus, renal, bladder, and neuroendocrine tumors, who have no standard curative treatment options available. The study has specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and patients must meet certain health requirements to be eligible for participation.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with breast cancer, testing the drugs erlotinib and rad001, with eligibility criteria including specific disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the drug bi10773 and a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for HIV patients who are currently receiving a stable antiretroviral regimen and are willing to switch therapy to test the effectiveness of rilpivirine, a drug used to treat HIV.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drug azd4877 for patients with lymphoma, and the eligibility criteria include certain types of cancer, failed previous treatments, and relatively good overall health.
This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of insulin degludec, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with chronic myelogenous leukemia and philadelphia chromosome positive acute lymphoblastic leukemia, testing the drug dasatinib, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for previously untreated aggressive non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, testing the effectiveness of cyclophosphamide, doxorubicin, vincristine, and prednisone as a treatment option. The eligibility criteria include measurable or evaluable disease, stage I-IV patients, age 18 or older, and no evidence of grade 3 or more neurosensory or neuromotor dysfunction. HIV positive patients, those with inadequate bone marrow and organ function, CNS involvement by lymphoma, uncontrolled intercurrent disease, active infection or fever, inadequate contraceptive precautions, pregnancy, or breastfeeding are excluded from the study.

This phase 1 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of decitabine and pegylated liposomal doxorubicin hydrochloride in treating patients with relapsed epithelial ovarian cancer, including fallopian tube and primary peritoneal cancer, who have received up to four previous lines of chemotherapy, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 1 trial for Alzheimer's disease, testing the drug GSK933776 and a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with breast cancer, testing the drugs ptk787 and trastuzumab, with specific eligibility criteria including HER2 gene amplification and restrictions on prior treatments and medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for healthy adults, investigating the drugs sam-531 and donepezil, with inclusion criteria including age, body mass index, and overall good health, and exclusion criteria including various medical conditions and recent consumption of caffeine or alcohol.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with metastatic or locally recurrent colorectal cancer, testing the drugs zd1839 and oxaliplatin in patients who have failed prior therapy with fluorouracil, leucovorin calcium, and irinotecan. This sample is a phase 1 trial for breast cancer patients, testing the drugs paclitaxel, docetaxel, and capecitabine, with eligibility criteria including histologic confirmation of invasive breast cancer, certain tumor sizes and lymph node involvement, and adequate organ function.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with melanoma, testing the drugs genasense® (oblimersen), abraxane® (paclitaxel protein-bound particles), and temodar® (temozolomide), with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for dementia, testing different drug combinations including placebo, donepezil, mk-3134, and scopolamine, with specific eligibility criteria for male participants between 18 and 40 years of age.
